product_name: Black Diamond Trail Pro Trekking Poles - Pair
long_description: Black Diamond Trail Pro trekking poles combine double FlickLock Pro adjustability and comfortable foam grips with lightweight and durable aluminum shafts to help stabilize you and enhance your treks.
short_description: Black Diamond Trail Pro trekking poles combine double FlickLock Pro adjustability and comfortable foam grips with lightweight and durable aluminum shafts to help stabilize you and enhance your treks.
